sentence.Network_en: He was very proud of his old Virginian ancestry.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对于他那久远的弗吉尼亚的家谱很引以自豪.

sentence.Network_en: His father, a Virginian, was a restless man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的父亲是弗吉尼亚人, 从不安于现状.

sentence.Network_en: Two Virginian Congressmen sponsored the bill.
sentence.Network_cn: 两位弗吉尼亚国会议员提出这一议案.

auth_sentence.content: The Virginian's contempt is obvious in his Tidewater drawl.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Virginian's contempt is obvious in his Tidewater drawl.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Virginian's contempt is obvious in his Tidewater drawl.

auth_sentence.content: The adaptation of the Virginian Creeper to climbing up vertical walls.
auth_sentence.res_content: The adaptation of the Virginian Creeper to climbing up vertical walls.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The adaptation of the Virginian Creeper to climbing up vertical walls.

auth_sentence.content: Not written by a Virginian, but a visitant from another State.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not written by a Virginian, but a visitant from another State.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not written by a Virginian, but a visitant from another State.
